name: Color Me You
description:
A colorful and whimsical platformer made for Pygame Community Summer Jam 2022 with the theme "Dimensions."

Play as an ink drop traversing a world of subtractive color to reach its lover "papier-san." Use a toggling system to interact with platforms of the relevant color. Watch your footing! Collect all three ink cartridges scattered in the level before proceeding towards papier-san; find the fourth "cartridge" for a surprise!

---

Controls:

  • ESF: Player movement
  • R: Restart
  • Q: Quit
  • F11: Switch between full-screen/windowed mode

---

Link to source code: https://github.com/Grimmys/ColorMeYou

Authors: broqentoys#7528, Grimmys#0373

N.B.: check attributions.txt file on source code for details about assets used.
